entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
